rows.RETROSPECTIVE GUIDE: Regular team reflection for continuous improvement
WHAT IS A RETRO
A retrospective is a structured team discussion to:
• Reflect on what happened
• Identify what worked and what didn't
• Agree on improvements for next time
Cadence: Weekly or bi-weekly (30-45 min)
SIMPLE RETRO FORMAT
Three questions (5 min each, then discuss):
1. WHAT WENT WELL?
[Celebrate wins, acknowledge good work]
2. WHAT DIDN'T GO WELL?
[Be honest, no blame - focus on systems]
3. WHAT WILL WE DO DIFFERENTLY?
[Concrete action items with owners]
RETRO RULES
• No blame - focus on systems, not people
• Everyone participates
• What's said in retro stays in retro
• Action items must have owners and deadlines
• Follow up on last retro's action items
• Keep it short - respect everyone's time
